column4: ok, i tried: scp /filename name@computer:/file and i get this following error -> not a regular file
drop de /
same error comes up without the /
what you want to doe exactly copy file to your home dir on the other server?
i want to copy a file from a directory that under the home directory and put it on another computer
it is not direct in the home directory though. it is in a file under the home directory
scp /home/filename server: or if you want to put it elsewhere : scp /home/filename server:/path/to/the/place

this is what i tried -> scp home/myusername/fileDirectory/file server:/path/path2/file
thy this: scp /home/myusername/fileDirectory/file server:/path/path2/file
with the / before home
same problem. maybe this helps. the error states -> /home/myusername/fileDirectory/file: not a regular file
can you give me the output of this command: ls -la /home/myusername/fileDirectory/file
its a long output since there a lot of files in it
scp is made to transfer folders corret?
aaah
it's a directory?
yes
scp -r dir server:/dir
